Package entity

Class AvailabilitySlot

java.lang.Object
entity.AvailabilitySlot
public class AvailabilitySlot extends Object
Represents an availability slot for a doctor in the Hospital Management System. Handles creating, viewing, and managing availability slots.

    • AvailabilitySlot

      public AvailabilitySlot(Doctor doctor)
      Constructs an AvailabilitySlot for the given doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor for whom the slot is being created

    • AvailabilitySlot

      public AvailabilitySlot(Doctor doctor, String dayString, String timeString)
      Constructs an AvailabilitySlot with specified details.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor for whom the slot is being created
      dayString - the day of the availability slot (e.g., "Monday")
      timeString - the time range of the availability slot (e.g., "9:00 - 9:30")

    • addAvailability

      public void addAvailability(int day, double startTime)
      Adds an availability slot for a doctor on a specific day.
      Parameters:
      day - the day number (e.g., 1 for Monday)
      startTime - the start time of the slot (e.g., 9.0 for 9:00 AM)

    • viewAvailabilities

      public static List<String[]> viewAvailabilities()
      Displays all available slots with 30-minute intervals.
      Returns:
      a list of available slots as arrays of strings

    • filterslots

      public static List<AvailabilitySlot> filterslots(List<AvailabilitySlot> availabilitySlots, String filterAttribute, String filterValue)
      Filters availability slots based on a specified attribute.
      Parameters:
      availabilitySlots - the list of slots to filter
      filterAttribute - the attribute to filter by (e.g., "doctorId", "dayString")
      filterValue - the value to match for the filter
      Returns:
      a list of filtered availability slots

    • pickAvailability

      public static String[] pickAvailability()
      Allows a patient to pick an available 30-minute slot.
      Returns:
      the chosen slot as an array of strings

    • addAllAvailabilitySlotsForDoctor

      public static void addAllAvailabilitySlotsForDoctor(Doctor doctor, String dayString)
      Adds all availability slots for a doctor on a specific day.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor for whom the slots are being added
      dayString - the day of the availability (e.g., "Monday")

    • displayTimeSlotMenu

      public static void displayTimeSlotMenu()
      Displays the menu for selecting a time slot.

    • getStartTimeForSlot

      public static double getStartTimeForSlot(int slot)
      Gets the start time for a given time slot number.
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot number (1-16)
      Returns:
      the start time in hours, or -1 if the slot number is invalid
